Articles.Content:
Capsule, 4 fuel tanks, 4 port exhaust.

Left it on all night after leaving the atmosphere, I've now hit 0% speed loss.

13 hours, 14 minutes in

14 hours, 38 minutes in

For a brick, he flies pretty good!
Now all you need is a planet to crash/orbit around and your gold.

Sorry but not impressive, and after 40km I believe, it is glitched to have 0% gravitational pull.

:B

Sorry but not impressive, and after 40km I believe, it is glitched to have 0% gravitational pull.

:B

How is it getting 14g's then? o-O

When watching the Display, one can deduct that the rocket is turning around itself, since it is pretty far from the center of flight direction (the yellow circal). Since circular movent cause torque and torque results in centrifugal and centripetal power its possible that it gets the 14g's from this
